overview:
Radu is managing the Timisoara Software Business Incubator, a startup support organization in West Romania.

Radu involves in the Timisoara local IT & geek communities, organizing or contributing to events like geek meets, entrepreneurship promotion workshops, agile programming and mobile development meetups, etc.

video_embeds.description: A short video in RO, from the inaugural event of the Timisoara Mobile Development Group, January, 10th.
